channel.title: How do i make the tree fall?
channel.description: i have my tree and everything works on it. but i want the tree to fall down and when i get the logs into my inventory i want to get cash then. and how do i set a timer for how long the tree is 'dead' and how do i set how many logs it puts out?

ok thanks. erm got msn or anything?

item.title: How do i make the tree fall?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Use these classes.
Timer
TimerTask

The face is the direction that your object faces.
Sorry, I can’t help you anymore right now, but I wish you luck with this.

item.title: How do i make the tree fall?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

When it adds the logs to your inventory use ReplaceObject(x, y, stumpID, face) to replace the tree with a stump, and have a timer for it to grow back.

Read full topic
